questions.a: Flappy Evolution is an innovative game that combines classic Flappy Bird gameplay with evolution mechanics, allowing players to evolve their bird with different wing types and abilities.

questions.q: How does the evolution system work?
questions.a: Players can collect evolution points during gameplay to unlock and combine different wing types (Bird, Robot, Magic), each offering unique abilities and gameplay advantages.

questions.q: Is the game free to play?
questions.a: Yes, the game is free to play with optional in-game purchases for cosmetic items and special wing combinations.

questions.q: Where can I download the game?
questions.a: The game will be available on Google Play Store for Android devices and as a web browser game.
